memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int m, const float *A, rocblas_int lda, float *x, rocblas_int incx)
memberdef.name: rocblas_strsv

detaileddescription.para: trsv solves A*x = alpha*b or A**T*x = alpha*b,
where x and b are vectors and A is a triangular matrix.
The vector x is overwritten on b.

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
rocblas_fill. rocblas_fill_upper: A is an upper triangular matrix. rocblas_fill_lower: A is a lower triangular matrix.
rocblas_diagonal. rocblas_diagonal_unit: A is assumed to be unit triangular. rocblas_diagonal_non_unit: A is not assumed to be unit triangular.
rocblas_int m specifies the number of rows of b. m >= 0.
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU, of dimension ( lda, m )
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A. lda = max( 1, m ).
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
specifies the increment for the elements of x.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_fill uplo, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_diagonal diag, rocblas_int m, const double *A, rocblas_int lda, double *x, rocblas_int incx)
memberdef.name: rocblas_dtrsv
